vehicles.name: Scout Mech
vehicles.desc: Light, fast, and built to find the enemy before the enemy finds you. She runs, she watches, and she reports.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built scout mech for immediate reconnaissance scenarios. Start new mech pilots here.

vehicles.name: Heavy Battlemech
vehicles.desc: Sixty tons of walking firepower. She anchors the lance and everything she shoots at stops existing.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built heavy mech for immediate large-scale mech combat. The centrepiece of any lance.

vehicles.name: Assault Quad
vehicles.desc: Four-legged stability, heavy weapons, and the refusal to fall down. She plants herself and fires until the battlefield is quiet.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built quad assault for immediate deployment. Stable platform, devastating firepower, difficult to topple.
